gcci.text: H100 supply constraints ease as US-East allocation rises, allowing hyperscalers to reallocate capex from spot markets to long-term contracts.

gtpi.text: DeepSeek's aggressive token pricing drives API cost compression, shifting procurement toward smaller, efficient models.

gagl.text: 150 TWh annual AI load heightens grid strain, accelerating nuclear baseload adoption and demand response.

aipi.text: Consolidation phase points to sustainable growth, with investors rewarding operational efficiency over capex scale.
